### isForced() {#a5f5fde523aac0f9086c8572e53f7ae72}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>const std::optional&lt; bool &gt; &amp; anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;LoopDistribute.cpp&#125;::LoopDistributeForLoop::isForced () const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Return if distribution forced to be enabled/disabled for the loop.

If the optional has a value, it indicates whether distribution was forced to be enabled (true) or disabled (false). If the optional has no value distribution was not forced either way.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopdistribute-cpp/#l00891">891</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopdistribute-cpp">LoopDistribute.cpp</a>.

## Private Member Functions

### includeOnlyCrossPartitionChecks() {#a86d64629e20bf172b2932f93b2649747}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>SmallVector&lt; RuntimePointerCheck, 4 &gt; anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;LoopDistribute.cpp&#125;::LoopDistributeForLoop::includeOnlyCrossPartitionChecks (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a12b6596f3de8ec2382209b04c2b5444c">RuntimePointerCheck</a> &gt; &amp; AllChecks, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; int &gt; &amp; PtrToPartition, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/runtimepointerchecking">RuntimePointerChecking</a> &#42; RtPtrChecking)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Filter out checks between pointers from the same partition.

<code>PtrToPartition</code> contains the partition number for pointers. Partition number -1 means that the pointer is used in multiple partitions. In this case we can&#39;t safely omit the check.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopdistribute-cpp/#l00899">899</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopdistribute-cpp">LoopDistribute.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

If the optional has a value, it indicates whether distribution was forced to be enabled (true) or disabled (false). If the optional has no value distribution was not forced either way.
